name: GreenPong
description:
CONTROLS:

Player1 (Left Paddle):

Move up: W

Move down: S

Player2 (Right Paddle):

Move up: Up arrow

Move down: Down arrow

Made as a learning project following this course made by Glauco Pires and Zenva:

https://academy.zenva.com/course/unity-2d-game-development-projects-pong/

Author: Yone Moreno Jimenez
